pattern: when can we contact the office
responses: Office will be available from 9:00 am to 4.30 pm everyday except sundays

pattern: when can we contact the college
responses: College will be working from 9.00 am to 4.00 pm
You can wear both casuals or formal dresses, anything of your interest

pattern: how many seats are there in the college
responses: There are 180 seats in Mechanical, ECE department and 240 seats in CSE, IT department

pattern: Can we come by our personal transport
is there any college bus transport
responses: You can come by your personal transport, parking facility is available. College bus transport is also available across various locations across chennai

pattern: how much is the bus fee
responses: fee will be calculated according to the distance

pattern: Is there any entrance exam for this college
do we have to pass any entrance exam to get into this college
responses: College admission will be provided based on your 12th and 10th mark and JEE mark will be given higher priority

pattern: What are the rules and regulations of the college
What are the rules to be followed inside the college
responses:
1.Mobile phone should not be used during class hours
2.Ragging is strictly prohibited
3.Any kind of physical violence will be punished
This is an autonomous college

pattern: Does this college provide placement training
Is placement training available in this college
responses: Placement training will be provided to students by SMART,FacePrep

pattern: How many courses are there in this college
What are the different courses available
responses:
There are 4 diferent courses available in our college
  1. CSE
  2. IT
  3.ECE
  4.Mechanical

pattern: What are the qualifications of the faculties
How much talented are the faculties
responses: All of our faculties have minimum qualification of M.tech and many of them have Phd degree with them

pattern: How many subjects will be there in each semester
Total no of subjects per semester
responses: In each semester there will be 6 theory subjects and 3 practical subject
Welcome
Have a good day!
For further details contact: 0123456789

pattern: Does the college provide scholarship for students
responses:
Scholarship will be provided to students considering the following
  1.First graduate
  2.Annual income of the family
  3.Marks attained in hsc

pattern: What is the rank of the college
What is the NIRF rank of the college
responses: Our college is ranked 7th in the NIRF ranking

pattern: Is canteen available in this college
responses: Yes, we have our own canteen, were foods will be prepared in a very hygiene manner

pattern: Is this college free from ragging
Will ragging takes place in this college
responses: Our college is completely free from ragging, Students will be provided Anti-Ragging commitee number in their ID-card

pattern: What are the sports available in this college
Different sports available in this college
responses: Our college have various sports like Cricket, Football, Tennis, Badminton, Volleyball and many indoor games
